sentences.en: Adam whistled happily on his way to work.
sentences.cn: 亚当在上班路上愉快地吹着口哨。

sentences.en: an attorney who blew the whistle on governmental corruption.
sentences.cn: 一个揭发政府腐败的律师

sentences.en: Blowing its whistle, the train moved out, slowly at first.
sentences.cn: 汽笛一响, 列车就徐徐开动了.

sentences.en: He whistled a tune as he strolled down the corridor.
sentences.cn: 他口里吹着一首曲子沿着走廊缓步走去。

sentences.en: Hugh listened to the whistle of a train.
sentences.cn: 休听着火车呼啸而过。

sentences.en: I heard this song on the radio and I’ve been whistling it all day.
sentences.cn: 我在收音机里听到这首歌，就吹了一整天这个调子的口哨。

sentences.en: Jackson gave a low whistle.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊低声吹了下口哨。

sentences.en: Larsson scored just minutes before the final whistle.
sentences.cn: 拉尔森就在终场哨声响起前几分钟进球得分。

sentences.en: On the platform, the guard blew his whistle.
sentences.cn: 平台上的警卫吹响了哨子.

sentences.en: Polly blinked and emitted a long, low whistle.
sentences.cn: 波莉眨了眨眼，吹了一声低沉而悠长的口哨。

sentences.en: Startled by the sudden whistle of the train, the horse broke away.
sentences.cn: 火车突然鸣笛, 那匹马受惊脱逃.

sentences.en: The conductor blew his whistle, and the tram stopped.
sentences.cn: 售票员吹哨子, 电车停了下来.

sentences.en: The game's not over till the ref blows the whistle.
sentences.cn: 裁判吹响哨子，比赛才算结束。

sentences.en: The lifeguard blew his whistle.
sentences.cn: 救生员吹响哨子。

sentences.en: The referee blew a whistle at the end of the game.
sentences.cn: 裁判在比赛结束时吹响了哨子.

sentences.en: The referee blew his whistle for a penalty.
sentences.cn: 裁判鸣哨判罚.

sentences.en: The referee blew his whistle for full time.
sentences.cn: 裁判吹响了比赛结束的哨音。

sentences.en: The referee finally blew the whistle to stop the game.
sentences.cn: 裁判最后吹响了终场的哨声。

sentences.en: The referee whistled and the game began.
sentences.cn: 裁判哨声一响，比赛开始了。

sentences.en: The whistle was inaudible to the human ear.
sentences.cn: 这种啸声人耳听不到。

sentences.en: The whistle went for no side.
sentences.cn: 一声哨响比赛结束。

sentences.en: to go on a whistle-stop tour of Europe
sentences.cn: 到欧洲各地作走马看花的观光

words.tran_cn: 发出哨声的；听起来像哨声的
口哨；[铁路][船]汽笛；啸啸声

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)终止不合法活动；告发，揭发
揭发：怀着使违法行为得以中止的希望而告发
给自己壮胆：试图鼓起某人的勇气

trans.tran_en: a small object that produces a high whistling sound when you blow into it

trans.tran_cn: 吹口哨，呼啸着行进，鸣叫，(鸟类）啭鸣
trans.tran_en: to make a high or musical sound by blowing air out through your lips
to make a high or musical sound by blowing air out through your lips
